articles.title: 10 Best Christmas Horror Games on Steam

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
NPCs in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life give some of the strangest requests you'll ever see. Some are normal, with people asking you to help pick up trash or deliver some food. Other times, they want you to pull some pranks or randomly give others paper because life's boring. 


Although it's a little odd, we're not here to judge them. Here's how to give paper to someone in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to find paper in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life


Giving paper to someone in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life requires giving someone any paper item that isn't strictly job-related. In other words, you can give someone a movie ticket from Watch-O-Plex or paper from a mailbox, but you can't go around giving someone citation tickets or important bank documents. The easiest way is to approach any mailbox around Brick Bay and pick up a stack of papers.



Screenshot by Destructoid


Screenshot by Destructoid



Generally speaking, as long as the item is made of paper in some way, it's acceptable for this task. I haven't tested it with books yet, but considering a movie ticket works, there's some leeway. The task also specifies you can give any type of paper, so I'm sure there's room for surprises here.


Once you have your papers, hold right-click in front of an NPC or your platform's give button to gift the stack. You can also do this to another player, but they're not guaranteed to accept the "gift." The controls are also a little awkward, so don't worry if it takes a couple of tries for someone to take the paper.


Upon accepting the paper, they'll express gratitude for unknown reasons, marking the task as complete and allowing you to take on another job later. You've now given someone paper and can either feel good about the prank or question the point of it. 

The post How to give paper to someone in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to give paper to someone in LEGO Fortnite Brick Life

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The first pirate site blocking order in Canada was 'discontinued' this week. The plaintiffs, including rightsholders Bell and Rogers, won't request an extension of the landmark blocking measures against IPTV service GoldTV. Interestingly, many of the targeted domains are still online. No reason was provided for the discontinuation, but costs and changed priorities likely play a role.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Canada’s First Pirate Site Blocking Order Quietly Expires

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a recent filing at the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals, ISP Cox maintains that DMCA subpoenas don't apply to Internet providers. Several movie studios hope to convince the court otherwise, as that would strengthen their piracy enforcement efforts, making it easier to identify online pirates. According to Cox, however, Congress clearly excluded ISPs from this legal 'shortcut'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox to Appeals Court: DMCA Subpoenas Don’t Apply to Us, Period

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In an ongoing escalation of its fight against online sports piracy, media giant Canal+ secured court orders compelling DNS providers Quad9 and Vercara to block access to pirate streaming sites in France. Quad9 says that it's determined to appeal what it sees as an absurd application of copyright law. For now, however, it will block the targeted domain names globally.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Piracy Blocking Order Goes Global, DNS Service Quad9 Vows to Fight

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italy's Piracy Shield IPTV blocking system is back in the news today after yet another completely avoidable blocking blunder. On Monday night, yet another CDN IP address was added to the blocklist rendering innocent sites unavailable. Italian tech news site DDaY, a long-standing critic of Piracy Shield's indiscriminate blocking, was among those affected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield Blacks Out Tech News Site by Blocking Another CDN IP

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Trouble continues for the popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy. After several technical issues last week, the site has become unreachable. At the same time, the related 'TGxGoodies' uploader accounts at other torrent sites have been inactive for days. TorrentGalaxy switched owners earlier this year, but it's unclear what's behind the recent problems. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy’s Troubles Silence Popular Upload Bots (Update)

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Music streaming app Musi claims Apple removed its app from the App Store after "backroom conversations" with key music industry players.  The app developer alleges this was an "unfair" and "tainted" removal process designed to put it out of business.  Musi is seeking a preliminary injunction to reinstate its app while the legal battle plays out. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Musi Decries Apple’s App Store Removal: A “Backroom Scheme” with Music Industry (Update)

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Indie videgame portal Itch.io is effectively offine today after a brand protection company reported the platform for "fraud/phishing" for what was a problem easily solved using a DMCA notice. According to Google's transparency databases, the same company has repeatedly attempted to use the DMCA to solve alleged trademark infringement but had its complaints rejected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bogus Complaint Disables Itch.io, Google Ignored Same Sender For Years

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cloudflare is actively disabling access to some pirate site URLs on its network, informing visitors that the requested pages are unavailable for legal reasons. While these types of 'HTTP 451' error messages are relatively rare, they are nothing more than Cloudflare complying with its legal obligations under the DMCA.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Blocks Pirate Site URLs “For Legal Reasons”

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Juror #2' tops the chart, followed by 'Deadpool & Wolverine'. 'Alien: Romulus' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 12/09/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Greece is buzzing with news of a historic, landmark decision by a local court, to imprison a person for five months for subscribing to a pirate IPTV service. The news warrants an informed conversation about creators' rights and how the judicial system has sharpened its response to piracy. However, until evidence is produced to the contrary, the story should be stamped "propaganda" and noted for an offense of its own: a distraction from genuine progress in the fight against piracy.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Historic Decision’ to Imprison Pirate IPTV User Smells of Propaganda

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a bid to identify individuals allegedly involved in creating and distributing cheats for the video game Destiny 2, Bungie has subpoenaed the U.S.-based cryptocurrency exchange Kraken.  The subpoena seeks to identify the owner of a Bitcoin wallet, who is believed to be a European resident. This individual, however, is contesting the subpoena, claiming it violates EU privacy laws and other regulations.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bungie Targets Bitcoin Wallet in Effort to Expose ‘Destiny 2’ Cheaters

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The ACE anti-piracy coalition sidelined dozens of sports streaming sites this week with action against dozens of domain names including Crackstream and various Streameast clones. The official Streameast was targeted by the U.S. Government earlier this year, but the copycat takedowns are just as important, as these sites drew more traffic than the original.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ACE Seizes Sports Piracy Domains including Crackstream and Streameast Clones

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Hidden pirate features within seemingly harmless apps, known as "stealth apps," are slipping past Apple's App Store security, offering users access to pirated movies and TV shows.  Taiwan's Criminal Police Bureau recently busted three individuals promoting unlock instructions for these apps to roughly 400,000 users.  Surprisingly, this tech-savvy scheme was orchestrated by a group whose combined age totals 215 years.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Apple Stealth Piracy App Trio, Combined Age 215 Years, Face $18.5m Damages Claim

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan's Cultural Affairs Agency is looking towards AI to strengthen the country's battle against rampant online piracy. The pilot program proposed by the agency would see culturally significant manga and anime content protected by automated image and text recognition systems, with less reliance placed on resource-intensive human intervention.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Japan Plans AI Pilot Program to Fight Manga & Anime Piracy

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
MP3.to is a nifty online tool that allows users to convert MP3s to dozens of other file formats. While these conversions don't knowingly violate any law, Spanish music industry group Promusicae reportedly labeled the service an audio download tool. In response, Google removed the URL from its search engine and banned the associated AdSense account.  However, after the MP3 site involved its lawyer, Google reversed its decision.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: MP3.to Successfully Challenges Music Industry’s ‘False’ DMCA Circumvention Takedown

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A 42-year-old man was arrested in a recent UK crackdown on illegal IPTV suppliers, with a special mention for 'illicit Firesticks'.  Local police, in collaboration with anti-piracy group FACT, also sent cease and desist letters to thirty other suspects. While FACT warns that pirate operators risk criminal penalties, there appears to be no end in sight for the streaming piracy whack-a-mole.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: UK Police and FACT Continue IPTV Piracy Whack-a-Mole

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A long-running lawsuit against pirate set-top box distributor Jadoo TV, launched by DISH Network and coordinated by the International Broadcaster Coalition Against Piracy, has ended with a $24.9m judgment in favor of the plaintiffs. In addition to the imminent shutdown of the IPTV service, domain names, trademarks, and all customer lists will be handed over to DISH.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Jadoo TV Piracy Lawsuit Ends in $24.9m Judgment, Customers Exposed

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Trouble continues for some of the largest pirate sites specializing in Asian entertainment. Coinciding with the shutdown of Dramacool, GogoAnime and Anitaku stopped uploading new content. This weekend, AnimeFenix added to the trouble with a 'voluntary' shutdown citing more copyright pressure. "Piracy will never go away as long as there are companies with more greed than heart," the AnimeFenix team notes in its farewell message. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: AnimeFenix Shuts Down & GogoAnime/Anitaku Freezes in Time

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
As part of an ongoing piracy lawsuit, Nintendo has filed a motion to subpoena Reddit, Discord, and other online platforms for information related to the alleged operator of several pirate shops. The game giant seeks information on the defendant, who previously served as a moderator of the SwitchPirates subreddit, and suggests that Reddit may be able to identify additional 'pirates'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Nintendo Wants Reddit to Expose r/SwitchPirates Users in ‘Pirate Shop’ Lawsuit

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (sev)
articles.description:
We've been working for a while on the next ScummVM release, and it is time for a call for public testing.
Support for a number of new engines and games for the existing ones was added, and we need your special attention to the following titles:
Orion Burger.
Total Eclipse and Total Eclipse 2.
Thimbleweed Park.
The Space Bar.
Moonbase Commander. (with multiplayer support)
Backyard Basketball.
Unrest.
Rise of the Dragon.
Castle Master.
Wait for it! Issue 3. Song for a Hare. (Ну, погоди! Выпуск 3. Песня для зайца)
Mask Show. (Маски-шоу)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat. (Три маленькие белые мышки. Визит Морской крысы)
The Adventures of the Good Soldier Schweik. (Похождения бравого солдата Швейка)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday. (Три маленькие белые мышки. День рождения морской крысы)
Besides these newly supported games, almost half of the current 108 engines have notable changes. Thus, testing more games is always a good thing.
All testing must be done with stable builds, not development ones. Please report bugs or oddities on our issue tracker.
A detailed list of all exciting new features and fixes is available in our NEWS file.
We are looking forward to your reports about successful and unsuccessful playthroughs and bugs reported!
>
articles.title: Help us to test the upcoming ScummVM 2.9.0!

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: "Bohužel" tento film není tak špatný, aby byl zábavný. Je to jen nuda, která není vůbec ničím zajímavá. Takhle nějak si představuji, že budou vypadat stoprocentně AI generované filmy. Nejzajímavější a nejzábavnější je malá role Russella Crowea.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Lovec Kraven [Kraven The Hunter] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Někdo napsal scénář s cool zápletkami a dialogy, někdo vymodeloval úžasná prostředí, někdo složil hudbu a nahrál dialogy skoro jako John Williams a Harrison Ford... To všechno funguje velmi dobře. Ale je to proloženo otravnou hrou, kde pořádně nefunguje boj, stealth ani puzzly, a jejíž interaktivita zdržuje od toho cool příběhu.
articles.title: Skororecenze: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Za pár dní má v našich kinech (a po celém světě) premiéru "remasterovaná verze" kultovní animované podívané Interstella 5555. A je důležité říct si něco o tom, o jakou podívanou vlastně jde a v čem přesně spočívá ten "remaster".
U zrodu tohoto počinu stálo elektronické hudební duo Daft Punk, které v roce 2001 vydalo své album "Discovery". K písničkám z alba vyšly animované videoklipy, které produkoval Leidži Macumoto, což byl kultovní japonský výtvarník (zemřel loni), který měl na svém kontě mnoho animovaných seriálů, především ze 70. - 80. let (nejslavnější z nich byl asi "Space Battleship Yamato"). Daft Punk ho oslovili proto, že na jeho seriálech vyrůstali, takže výsledné dílo, včetně "jednodušší" retro animace a naivní zápletky zcela záměrně připomíná staré japonské televizní počiny (n…
articles.title: Recenze: Daft Punk & Leiji Matsumoto's Interstella 5555 - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Pokud zbožňujete stejnojmenný divadelní muzikál, funguje tento film pravděpodobně velmi dobře. Pokud ho vůbec neznáte, budete ve výrazné nevýhodě, a to z vícero důvodů. Přestože mám muzikály rád, téměř vůbec se u mě nedostavil jakýkoliv pocit dojetí nebo jiná silná emoce a z písniček si téměř nic nepamatuji. Což je bizarní, protože zbožňuji písničky v "Princi egyptském", kterého napsal stejný autor pár let před "Čarodějkou". - Ilča 50 %
articles.title: Audio recenze: Čarodějka [Wicked - Part 1] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Naprosto nezajímavé ve všech směrech, od scénáře, přes výtvarnou podobu a písničky, až po režii. V některých aspektech horší než jednička, v žádných lepší.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Odvážná Vaiana 2 [Moana 2] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kvalitní herecké výkony, občas slušná atmosféra, ale scénář je tak děravý, že si každou chvíli říkáte "proč to proboha udělal(a)?" a místy až znemožňuje pochopit, co se právě děje (je to sofistikovaná hra, nebo jí jenom praskly nervy?). Což je diametrální rozdíl oproti skvěle promyšlenému "Tísňovému volání". (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Dozorkyně [Vogter] - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Čekal jsem od Hugha Granta v roli chlípného starce hodně, a i přesto jsem byl příjemně překvapen. Je skvělý. Scénář není hloupý a nabízí pár námětů k zamyšlení nad tím, jak funguje víra. Bohužel, ke konci se film trochu neuspořádaně rozutíká do různých směrů, jako by se tvůrci neuměli rozhodnout, o čem to vlastně celé bylo. (Ilča 65 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Heretik [Heretic] - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description:
Mladá studentka Jindřiška přichází domů a zjišťuje, že jejich luxusní dům je v dražbě, všechen majetek v exekuci a její otec se kdesi skrývá a není k zastižení, zatímco matka netuší, co se vlastně stalo a jak otec ty dluhy nadělal, nebo o tom aspoň nechce mluvit. Debutující scenárista a režisér Vojtěch Strakatý nám přináší drama děvčete, které netuší, co si počít.


Existuje vícero českých filmů, které surfují na oblíbené vlně "zakažte exekutory, zrušte dluhy, je to nelidské!" (například Tancuj Matyldo). After Party takovým filmem není. Exekutoři se v něm chovají korektně a slušně a vinu na situaci celé rodiny nese naprosto jednoznačně otec, který neopatrně investoval, i když nevíme jak. A "nevíme jak" je téma, prolínající se celým tímto filmem. Takže nevíme, co vlastně otec komu naslibova…
articles.title: Recenze: After Party - 60%
